content.prompt: The form of the Tlatilco female figurine best expresses a concept of duality through the

choices.label: inclusion of two connected heads on a single body
asymmetrical arrangement of the two halves of the body
balance conveyed by long, outstretched arms with open hands

topic.text: 1.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
